name: Driving School Test 2016 Game
description:
Do you love the 3D driving school games then you are at the right place, This game is for the teenage who are ready to buy there first car. So this game will help you get your license.
Take test for car driving in 2016 with top end luxury vehicle you have never seen in driving test games.

Features:
Driving car school for beginner
Different levels
Amazing car driving game
An awesome driving simulator
